alias.send: idEnabled = not idEnabled SetVariable("idEnabled", tostring(idEnabled)) ColourNote("white", "blue", "Room IDs are now " .. (tostring(idEnabled) == "true" and "enabled" or "disabled") .. "!")

muclient.script:
require "gmcphelper"
idEnabled = GetVariable("idEnabled") or "true"
TSRtable = {}
function OnPluginBroadcast(msg, id, name, text) if (id == "3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264") then if (text == "room.info") then for i,v in pairs(TSRtable) do if v.text ~= "{rname}" then ColourTell (RGBColourToName (v.textcolour), RGBColourToName (v.backcolour), v.text) break; end end if tostring(idEnabled) == "true" then ColourTell("black", "black", " ") Hyperlink ("mapper goto " .. gmcp("room.info.num"), "(" .. gmcp("room.info.num") .. ")", "", "white", "black", 0) end Note("") end end end
